Reviews.Title: Happy with the D5200
Reviews.Author: Bud
Reviews.Content: Received before promised date, packed well, nice looking and very versitle.  I also had the opportunity to look at a D5200 kit at Costco.  It did not have as many accessories as the one I purchase from you but is was a $100.00 more.  I am more than satisfied.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Bronze) + <2> Nikon 55-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Battery Grip for D5100 & D5200 +
<4> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <5> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <6> Spare EN-EL14 Battery + <7> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<8> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <9> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <10> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <11> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens +
<12> HB-45 Lens Hood + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Bronze) with 55-300mm VR Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Grip & Battery + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses + Filters Kit
